taskbody.context: Use the following procedure to duplicate a transformation scenario.

step.cmd: Go to menu Document Transformation XML Configure Transformation Scenario (Ctrl (Meta on Mac OS)+Shift+C) (Alt+Shift+T C) ( (Meta+Alt+T C on Mac OS)) to open the Configure Transformation dialog.
Click the Duplicate Scenario button of the dialog to create a copy of the current scenario.
Click the Name field and type a new name.

substep.cmd: You can choose to save the scenarios at project level by setting the Project Scenarios setting.

step.cmd: Click OK or Transform Now to save the scenario.
